interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy.
The U.S. has the world's largest economy by nominal GDP.
The Great Wall of China is over 13,000 miles long.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the world's largest tropical rainforest.
Russia is the largest country by land area.
Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
Germany is known for its engineering and automobile industry.
The UK has one of the oldest monarchies still in existence.
France is the most visited country in the world.
Rome is home to the Vatican City, the smallest country in the world.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
